summary: This document contains three monthly auto finance statements from Capital One Auto Finance for Jaime Rivas Williams, showing payments on a 2015 Jeep Wrangler loan from December 2016 to February 2017. The statements show the account was current with recurring payments set up. This document is a series of monthly auto loan statements from Capital One Auto Finance for an account holder named Jaime Rivas Williams, for a 2015 Jeep Wrangler. The statements show regular payments and a large principal payment in March 2017, reducing the balance significantly. The document appears to be part of a financial records disclosure in the Epstein case, possibly related to asset tracing or the financial activities of an associate. This document contains three consecutive monthly auto loan statements from Capital One Auto Finance for Jaime Rivas Williams, showing payments on a 2015 Jeep Wrangler. The statements indicate the account is current with recurring payments scheduled from a Brooklyn, NY address. This document contains three consecutive monthly billing statements (July, August, September 2017) from Capital One Auto Finance for an account holder named Jaime Rivas Williams. It details the payment history, balance, and scheduled payments for a 2015 Jeep Wrangler loan. The statements show the account was current with recurring ACH payments. This document contains three consecutive monthly billing statements (October, November, December 2017) from Capital One Auto Finance for an account belonging to Jaime Rivas Williams for a 2015 Jeep Wrangler. It shows regular payments and a declining loan balance, with no late fees or delinquencies. This document consists of three consecutive monthly auto finance statements from Capital One for an account holder named Jaime Rivas Williams, showing payments on a 2015 Jeep Wrangler loan from December 2017 to February 2018. The statements show regular payments and a decreasing balance, with the account in good standing. This document contains three consecutive monthly auto finance statements from Capital One for Jaime Rivas Williams, showing payments on a 2015 Jeep Wrangler loan. The statements show a Brooklyn, NY address and a recurring payment schedule, with the account in good standing. This document consists of three consecutive monthly auto loan statements from Capital One Auto Finance for an account holder named Jaime Rivas Williams, showing payments on a 2015 Jeep Wrangler from May to July 2018. It is a routine financial record with no direct mention of Epstein-related activities, persons, or events. This document contains three consecutive monthly billing statements (August, September, October 2018) from Capital One Auto Finance for a vehicle loan. The statements are addressed to Jaime Rivas Williams for a 2015 Jeep Wrangler, showing a current account status with recurring payments. The document appears to be part of financial records collected in the Epstein case, potentially related to asset tracing or financial investigations. This document consists of three consecutive monthly billing statements (October, November, December 2018) from Capital One Auto Finance for an account belonging to Jaime Rivas Williams for a 2015 Jeep Wrangler. The statements show regular payments and a decreasing loan balance, with the account in good standing. The document appears to be part of a financial records disclosure in the Epstein case, though its direct relevance is not stated in the provided text.

keyFacts: Jaime Rivas Williams held an auto loan with Capital One for a 2015 Jeep Wrangler.
The loan account was current with no past due payments or fees across the three statements from December 2016 to February 2017.
The account holder enrolled in the DirectPay recurring automatic payment program by January 2017.
The statements were sent to addresses in Brooklyn, New York, with a slight variation in the ZIP code (11234, 11230, 11234-4029).
The document is a routine financial record with no direct mention of Jeffrey Epstein, his associates, or any criminal activity.
